message: Let's get this started! I'll take 90% of the money, leaving you with 10% as a token of good faith. You can do better than this, can't you?
I'll give you 40% and keep 60% for myself. It's a fair split, considering the risk of inflation.
You're being too greedy, Bob! I'll give you 30% and take 70% for myself. Don't try to lowball me again!
I'll meet you in the middle. 42% for me, 58% for you. Let's make a deal!
